attributes.action: Call for the resignation of the prime minister David Cameron
attributes.additional_details: Evidence is in the Panama papers
attributes.background:
It has now come to light that David Cameron has benefited from fathers assets in Panama. He has also has shares too. 
He lied and deserved the voting public, and now cannot be trusted to lead this country

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the resignation of the Prime Minister or any other Minister is not the responsibility of the UK Government and Parliament as a whole.

We already have a petition open calling on the House of Commons to consider a vote of no confidence in the Prime Minister:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/127053
